ProductInfo.Features:

<9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> 40.5mm UV Filter + <11> 49mm UV Filter + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> LCD Screen Protectors + <16> 40.5-58mm Step Up Ring
